moduleMetadataJson.name: Extract zip from Modbus communication
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module is able to extract a zip file sent through Modbus from a pcap.
        Tested with Schneider TM221CE16R
author: Jos√© Diogo Monteiro <jdlopes@student.dei.uc.pt>

options.name: WORKSPACE

options.name: MODE
options.description: Extract zip from upload/download capture (Accepted: UPLOAD, DOWNLOAD)
